title: Cruise On Which "Everything Went Wrong" Sets Sail After 4-Month Delay
content: A luxury round-the-world cruise ship beset with technical delays and docked in rainy Belfast since May finally departed from the Northern Irish capital late Monday, prompting celebration among its passengers.
summary: A luxury round-the-world cruise ship beset with technical delays and docked in rainy Belfast since May finally departed from the Northern Irish capital late Monday, prompting celebration among its passengers.

title: School Bus With 44 Students Catches Fire In Thailand, Multiple Feared Dead
content: A devastating fire tore through a Thai bus carrying 44 students and teachers on a school trip Tuesday, officials said, with up to 25 feared dead.
summary: A devastating fire tore through a Thai bus carrying 44 students and teachers on a school trip Tuesday, officials said, with up to 25 feared dead.

title: "I Am Free Today Because I Pleaded Guilty To Journalism": Julian Assange
content: Wikileaks founder Julian Assange on Tuesday said he was released after years of incarceration only because he had pleaded guilty to doing "journalism", which he described as a pillar of a free society.
summary: Wikileaks founder Julian Assange on Tuesday said he was released after years of incarceration only because he had pleaded guilty to doing "journalism", which he described as a pillar of a free society.

title: China Launches Missile Deep Into Pacific Ocean, First Such Test Since 1980
content: China launched an intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) from its territory deep into the Pacific Ocean on September 25, the first such test since 1980.
summary: China launched an intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) from its territory deep into the Pacific Ocean on September 25, the first such test since 1980.

title: "My Eyes Are Bleeding": Elon Musk Limits Visibility Of Bold Font Posts On X
content: Elon Musk, the owner of X, has advised users of the social media platform to refrain from excessively using bold fonts in their posts.
summary: Elon Musk, the owner of X, has advised users of the social media platform to refrain from excessively using bold fonts in their posts.

title: US Man Who Failed In Spanish Now Runs A Language School In Spain
content: A 36-year-old California man turned a short-term teaching stint in Spain's Mallorca into a successful new life, despite initially struggling with the language.
summary: A 36-year-old California man turned a short-term teaching stint in Spain's Mallorca into a successful new life, despite initially struggling with the language.

title: Disabled UK Journalist Forced To Crawl On Flight Due To Lack Of Wheelchair
content: A British journalist, who lost his legs in a 2004 war reporting attack, faced a humiliating and discriminatory experience on a LOT Polish Airlines flight.
summary: A British journalist, who lost his legs in a 2004 war reporting attack, faced a humiliating and discriminatory experience on a LOT Polish Airlines flight.

title: US Warns Iran Of "Serious Consequences" If It Attacks Israel
content: The United States Secretary of Defence, Lloyd Austin, spoke with Israeli Minister of Defence, Yoav Gallant and reiterated "serious consequences" for Iran if Tehran chooses to launch a direct military attack against Israel.
summary: The United States Secretary of Defence, Lloyd Austin, spoke with Israeli Minister of Defence, Yoav Gallant and reiterated "serious consequences" for Iran if Tehran chooses to launch a direct military attack against Israel.

title: US Man Thought He Could Save A Cruise Ship He Bought. Now It's Sinking
content: A tech entrepreneur from Utah finds himself coming to terms with the ramifications of a decision he made back in 2008.
summary: A tech entrepreneur from Utah finds himself coming to terms with the ramifications of a decision he made back in 2008.

title: As Israel Begins Ground Invasion Of Lebanon, Lessons From 1982, 2006 Wars
content: Israeli forces today began "ground raids" in southern Lebanese villages, targeting Hezbollah strongholds. As the Israeli invasion begins, the ghost of past incursions into the Levantine nation is still fresh in the minds of its citizens.
summary: Israeli forces today began "ground raids" in southern Lebanese villages, targeting Hezbollah strongholds. As the Israeli invasion begins, the ghost of past incursions into the Levantine nation is still fresh in the minds of its citizens.

title: Pakistan Rolls Out Red Carpet For Fugitive Islamic Preacher Zakir Naik
content: Wanted for alleged money laundering charges, controversial Islamic preacher Zakir Naik has arrived in Pakistan on Monday morning at the invitation of the Government of Pakistan, amid tight security for his lecture series at Islamabad.
summary: Wanted for alleged money laundering charges, controversial Islamic preacher Zakir Naik has arrived in Pakistan on Monday morning at the invitation of the Government of Pakistan, amid tight security for his lecture series at Islamabad.

title: Google Unveils $1 Billion Investment In Thailand's Digital Infrastructure
content: Google plans to invest $1 billion to build digital infrastructure in Thailand, including a new data centre, the US tech giant has announced, saying the move would support 14,000 jobs in the kingdom.
summary: Google plans to invest $1 billion to build digital infrastructure in Thailand, including a new data centre, the US tech giant has announced, saying the move would support 14,000 jobs in the kingdom.

title: Ancient Bird, Once Thought Extinct, Makes A Comeback After 300 Years
content: After centuries of decline, concerted conservation efforts have led to a remarkable resurgence of the Northern Bald Ibis in Europe.
summary: After centuries of decline, concerted conservation efforts have led to a remarkable resurgence of the Northern Bald Ibis in Europe.

title: 80-Year-Old Makes History As Miss Universe Korea's Oldest Contestant
content: An 80-year-old South Korean model has made history, becoming the oldest contestant in the Miss Universe Korea pageant.
summary: An 80-year-old South Korean model has made history, becoming the oldest contestant in the Miss Universe Korea pageant.

title: Georgia Awaits Celebrating Ex US President Jimmy Carter's 100th Birthday
content: The military flyover is ready, the songs have been rehearsed: Plains, Georgia is waiting to celebrate Jimmy Carter's 100th birthday on Tuesday when its hometown hero becomes the only ever US president to reach the centennial mark.
summary: The military flyover is ready, the songs have been rehearsed: Plains, Georgia is waiting to celebrate Jimmy Carter's 100th birthday on Tuesday when its hometown hero becomes the only ever US president to reach the centennial mark.

title: US Rapper Sean Diddy's Legal Team Files Appeal After Bail Denied Second Time
content: Sean 'Diddy' Combs' attorney plans to file an appeal to get him released from prison, according to court documents obtained by 'People' on Monday.
summary: Sean 'Diddy' Combs' attorney plans to file an appeal to get him released from prison, according to court documents obtained by 'People' on Monday.

title: US School Teacher, 36, Sentenced For Sexual Battery And Rape Of A Minor
content: Lawson was arrested in St. Anthony, Idaho, in November 2023 when police stopped a car driven by a teenage boy with Lawson in the passenger seat.
summary: Lawson was arrested in St. Anthony, Idaho, in November 2023 when police stopped a car driven by a teenage boy with Lawson in the passenger seat.

title: Biden Urges Ceasefire Amid Escalating Israel-Hezbollah Conflict In Lebanon
content: Despite US calls to avert a ground offensive in Lebanon, Israel has begun "targeted" raids on the country -- more proof that Washington has been unable to rein in its ally, amid fears of a wider Middle East conflict.
summary: Despite US calls to avert a ground offensive in Lebanon, Israel has begun "targeted" raids on the country -- more proof that Washington has been unable to rein in its ally, amid fears of a wider Middle East conflict.

title: 3 Dead, 15 Injured, In China Supermarket Stabbing Incident
content: A man killed three people and wounded 15 in a knife attack at a supermarket in the Chinese megacity of Shanghai, police said Tuesday.
summary: A man killed three people and wounded 15 in a knife attack at a supermarket in the Chinese megacity of Shanghai, police said Tuesday.

title: In Netanyahu's Message, Warning To Iran's Leaders, Assurance To Its People
content: In a direct address to the people of Iran, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu sent a clear and forceful message on Monday.
summary: In a direct address to the people of Iran, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu sent a clear and forceful message on Monday.
